014package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded;
015
016import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018import static de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseInfo.PG_DEFAULT_USER;
019import static java.lang.String.format;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.sql.Connection;
023import java.sql.SQLException;
024import java.sql.Statement;
025import java.util.Set;
026import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
027import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
028import java.util.concurrent.SynchronousQueue;
029import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
030import java.util.function.Supplier;
031import javax.sql.DataSource;
032
033import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
034import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ThreadFactoryBuilder;
035import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
036import org.slf4j.Logger;
037import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
038
039/**
040 * Manages the various databases within a postgres instance.
041 */
042public class DatabaseManager implements AutoCloseable {
043
044    public static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(DatabaseManager.class);
045
046    private final AtomicBoolean closed = new AtomicBoolean();
047    private final AtomicBoolean started = new AtomicBoolean();
048
049    private final EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<DataSource> dataSourcePreparer;
050    private final Set<EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<EmbeddedPostgres.Builder>> instancePreparers;
051    private final boolean multiMode;
052
053    private volatile InstanceProvider instanceProvider = null;
054    private volatile EmbeddedPostgres pg = null;
055
056    private DatabaseManager(EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<DataSource> dataSourcePreparer,
057            Set<EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<EmbeddedPostgres.Builder>> instancePreparers,
058            boolean multiMode) {
059        this.dataSourcePreparer = checkNotNull(dataSourcePreparer, "dataSourcePreparer is null");
060        this.instancePreparers = checkNotNull(instancePreparers, "instancePreparers is null");
061        this.multiMode = multiMode;
062    }
063
064    public static Builder<DatabaseManager> multiDatabases() {
065        return new DatabaseManagerBuilder(true);
066    }
067
068    public static Builder<DatabaseManager> singleDatabase() {
069        return new DatabaseManagerBuilder(false);
070    }
071
072    public DatabaseManager start() throws IOException, SQLException {
073        if (!started.getAndSet(true)) {
074            EmbeddedPostgres.Builder builder = EmbeddedPostgres.builder();
075            for (EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<EmbeddedPostgres.Builder> instancePreparer : instancePreparers) {
076                instancePreparer.prepare(builder);
077            }
078
079            this.pg = builder.build();
080
081            DataSource dataSourceToPrepare = multiMode ? pg.createTemplateDataSource() : pg.createDefaultDataSource();
082            dataSourcePreparer.prepare(dataSourceToPrepare);
083
084            this.instanceProvider = multiMode ? new InstanceProviderPipeline() : () -> pg.createDefaultDatabaseInfo();
085
086            this.instanceProvider.start();
087        }
088
089        return this;
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    public void close() throws Exception {
094        checkState(started.get(), "not yet started!");
095        if (!closed.getAndSet(true)) {
096            instanceProvider.close();
097            pg.close();
098        }
099    }
100
101    public DatabaseInfo getDatabaseInfo() throws SQLException {
102        checkState(started.get(), "not yet started!");
103
104        DatabaseInfo databaseInfo = instanceProvider.get();
105        if (databaseInfo.exception().isEmpty()) {
106            return databaseInfo;
107        } else {
108            throw databaseInfo.exception().get();
109        }
110    }
111
112    public EmbeddedPostgres getEmbeddedPostgres() {
113        checkState(started.get(), "not yet started!");
114        return pg;
115    }
116
117    private interface InstanceProvider extends Supplier<DatabaseInfo>, AutoCloseable {
118
119        default void start() {
120        }
121
122        @Override
123        default void close() {
124        }
125
126        DatabaseInfo get();
127    }
128
129    private final class InstanceProviderPipeline implements InstanceProvider, Runnable {
130
131        private final ExecutorService executor;
132        private final SynchronousQueue<DatabaseInfo> nextDatabase = new SynchronousQueue<>();
133
134        private final AtomicBoolean closed = new AtomicBoolean();
135
136        InstanceProviderPipeline() {
137            this.executor = Executors.newSingleThreadExecutor(
138                    new ThreadFactoryBuilder()
139                            .setDaemon(true)
140                            .setNameFormat("instance-creator-" + pg.instanceId() + "-%d")
141                            .build());
142
143        }
144
145        @Override
146        public void start() {
147            this.executor.submit(this);
148        }
149
150        @Override
151        public void close() {
152            if (!this.closed.getAndSet(true)) {
153                executor.shutdownNow();
154            }
155        }
156
157        @Override
158        public void run() {
159            while (!closed.get()) {
160                try {
161                    final String newDbName = EmbeddedUtil.randomLowercase(12);
162                    try {
163                        createDatabase(pg.createDefaultDataSource(), newDbName, PG_DEFAULT_USER);
164                        nextDatabase.put(DatabaseInfo.builder().dbName(newDbName).port(pg.getPort()).properties(pg.getConnectionProperties()).build());
165                    } catch (SQLException e) {
166                        // https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/errcodes-appendix.html - 57P01 admin_shutdown
167                        if (!e.getSQLState().equals("57P01")) {
168                            LOG.warn("Caught SQL Exception (" + e.getSQLState() + "):", e);
169                            nextDatabase.put(DatabaseInfo.forException(e));
170                        }
171                    }
172                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
173                    Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
174                    return;
175                } catch (Throwable t) {
176                    LOG.warn("Caught Throwable in loop:", t);
177                }
178            }
179        }
180
181        @Override
182        public DatabaseInfo get() {
183            try {
184                return nextDatabase.take();
185            } catch (final InterruptedException e) {
186                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
187                throw new IllegalStateException(e);
188            }
189        }
190    }
191
192    @SuppressFBWarnings("RCN_REDUNDANT_NULLCHECK_WOULD_HAVE_BEEN_A_NPE")
193    private static void createDatabase(final DataSource dataSource, final String databaseName, final String user) throws SQLException {
194        try (Connection c = dataSource.getConnection();
195                Statement stmt = c.createStatement()) {
196            stmt.executeUpdate(format("CREATE DATABASE %s OWNER %s ENCODING = 'utf8'", databaseName, user));
197        }
198    }
199
200    public abstract static class Builder<T> {
201
202        protected EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<DataSource> dataSourcePreparer = EmbeddedPostgresPreparer.noOp();
203        protected ImmutableSet.Builder<EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<EmbeddedPostgres.Builder>> instancePreparers = ImmutableSet.builder();
204        protected final boolean multiMode;
205
206        protected Builder(boolean multiMode) {
207            this.multiMode = multiMode;
208        }
209
210        /**
211         * @deprecated Use {@link #withDataSourcePreparer}.
212         */
213        @Deprecated
214        public Builder<T> withPreparer(DatabasePreparer databasePreparer) {
215            checkNotNull(databasePreparer, "databasePreparer is null");
216            this.dataSourcePreparer = databasePreparer::prepare;
217            return this;
218        }
219
220        public Builder<T> withDataSourcePreparer(EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<DataSource> dataSourcePreparer) {
221            this.dataSourcePreparer = checkNotNull(dataSourcePreparer, "dataSourcePreparer is null");
222            return this;
223        }
224
225        public Builder<T> withInstancePreparer(EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<EmbeddedPostgres.Builder> instancePreparer) {
226            this.instancePreparers.add(checkNotNull(instancePreparer, "instancePreparer is null"));
227            return this;
228        }
229
230        /**
231         * @deprecated Use {@link #withInstancePreparer}.
232         */
233        @Deprecated
234        public Builder<T> withCustomizer(EmbeddedPostgres.BuilderCustomizer customizer) {
235            checkNotNull(customizer, "customizer is null");
236            this.instancePreparers.add(customizer::customize);
237            return this;
238        }
239
240        public abstract T build();
241    }
242
243    public static class DatabaseManagerBuilder extends Builder<DatabaseManager> {
244
245        public DatabaseManagerBuilder(boolean multiMode) {
246            super(multiMode);
247        }
248
249        @Override
250        public DatabaseManager build() {
251            return new DatabaseManager(dataSourcePreparer, instancePreparers.build(), multiMode);
252        }
253    }
254}
